channel.title: Changing item preperties?
channel.description:
Ohkay so i recently got back into private servers and everything is so different im like UBNUB now.
How do you change item preperties like:
Its animation
What bonusess it gives you
level required to use
ect ect...
any help would be greatly apreciated and rep+
Thanks- beamer

item.title: Changing item preperties?
item.dc:creator: @strengthpk strengthpk
item.description:
@strengthpk wrote:

thanks king and super got it to work finally now i can add stats to my halo stuff and others

Read full topic

item.title: Changing item preperties?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

It’s pretty simple once you get the hang of it. It’s like this here.

item[space]=[space]7638[tab]Bandos_Boots[tab]A_nice_set_of_Bandos_boots,_worn_once_by_the_god_Bandos.[tab]122000000[tab]122000000[tab]122000000[tab]0[tab]0 [tab]0[tab]-6[tab]-2[tab]21[tab]22[tab]23[tab]0[tab]0[tab]6[tab]0. Just hit the space bar where it says [space] and hit the tab bar where it says [tab].

Read full topic

item.title: Changing item preperties?
item.dc:creator: @superxero superxero
item.description:
@superxero wrote:

Yay Rep

Basic overlay.
Open ure item.cfg
find the item you want to edit

Example

item = 9003	Bandos_GodSword	A_Bandos_Godsword.	1400000	1400000	1400000	135	135	135	1	1	10	10	10	10	10	190	2
item = "item id" "name here" "Examine" "sell price" "buy price" "alch price" "Stab Bonus" "Slash Bonus" "Crush Bonus" "mage bonus" "range bonus" "stab def" "slash def" "crush def" "mage def" "range def" "sttr bonus" "spell damage"

Hope it helped.

Read full topic
